subject: Re: Analytics
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi @DEWITT Derek A ddewitt@eugene-or.gov   

Please email support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com  - You will let them know if this was broken due to storm, vandalism, etc and include camera number and/or location and they will be able to help with next steps. Please CC me to the outreach so I can escalate it (since your email domain is external - you will get a quicker response vs. if I send them a direct email which can take much longer).

Thank you!

On Wed, May 28, 2025 at 2:05?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	It sounds like we have our first damage flock camera.  Can I get a cost estimate for all the parts.  Does Flock press charges as a victim for the damage?

	Detective D. DeWitt
	Financial Crimes Unit
	Special Weapons and Tactics Team
	Eugene Police Department
	300 County Club Road
	Eugene, OR 97401
	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
	Work Celll � 541-743-6192
________________________________

	From: Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com >
	Sent: Tuesday, May 27, 2025 9:48:03 AM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: Analytics 
	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Hi @DEWITT Derek A ddewitt@eugene-or.gov   

	Yes, we have our meeting today but that is focused on David spearheading the conversation around Freeform/Wing. Do you mind sharing some availability next week?

	Thank you 

	On Tue, May 27, 2025 at 9:40?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:
	

		Thank you for the information, do we still have our meeting scheduled for 12 today?  I am unavailable during both of those times this week and next.

		
		Derek

		 

		Detective D. DeWitt

		Financial Crimes Unit

		Special Weapons and Tactics Team

		Background Investigations Team

		Eugene Police Department

		300 County Club Road

		Eugene, OR 97401

		Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

		Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

		Work Cell � 541-743-6192



		From: Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com > 
		Sent: Tuesday, May 27, 2025 9:34 AM
		To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: Re: Analytics

		 

		[EXTERNAL ?]

		Hi @DEWITT Derek A ddewitt@eugene-or.gov   

		 

		Hope you enjoyed the long weekend. I just heard back from our Solutions team and essentially to get more insights into recent searches you can go to Network Audit and in the search type column you'll see that it will say "lookup" which means nationwide lookup. Even though you aren't necessarily sharing with these agencies it's just because they selected nationwide lookup which will populare in the audit as well. 

		 

		Let me know if you have any questions around this, happy to help.

		 

		Also, I'd like to schedule a follow up call to answer your questions around external hotlist sharing and any additional questions as I will have an expert join our call. Do you have time this upcoming Friday the 30th 1pm or Wednesday the 4th at 10am (Pacific Time)?

		 

		Thank you 

		 



		On Fri, May 23, 2025 at 10:16?AM Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com > wrote:

			Hi @DEWITT Derek A ddewitt@eugene-or.gov   

			 

			Yes, happy to help. Let me dig into this and I will get back to you soon.

			 

			Thank you,

			Gaby 

			 

			On Fri, May 23, 2025 at 9:35?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

				Good morning,

				 

				When I go to my insights dashboard and scroll to the bottom where it shows �recent searches� and then �Number of searches performed by users from your organizations and shared organizations� I get a bunch of returns from agencies we aren�t sharing information with.  I have attached a snip of those returns.  All five of the agencies listed are not in our shared agencies list.  Can you look at why we are receiving these?

				 

				Derek

				 

				Detective D. DeWitt

				Financial Crimes Unit

				Special Weapons and Tactics Team

				Background Investigations Team

				Eugene Police Department

				300 County Club Road

				Eugene, OR 97401

				Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

				Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

				Work Cell � 541-743-6192

				 

				

				 

			
			

			 

			-- 

	
Gaby Mahoney
Customer Success Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com

			 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/RqGQ2llW1Gw.png> 

		
		

		 

		--

	--
